articles.author: ELAINE KURTENBACH
articles.title: Stock market today: Asian shares are mostly lower ahead of key US inflation report - The Associated Press
articles.description: Shares have fallen in most Asian markets ahead of a key U.S. inflation report due Friday. Benchmarks fell more than 1% in Tokyo, Hong Kong and Sydney. Oil prices and U.S. futures also declined. On Wednesday, the S&P 500 index edged up 0.2% and most of its com…
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) Shares fell Thursday in most Asian markets ahead of a key U.S. inflation report due Friday that might point the way ahead for interest rates.
